QuestData.Title: Time is Short
QuestData.Description: I was hunting a demon named Razelikh, when his ogre lieutenant Grol assaulted me. I was caught unaware, and I died... but so did Grol.$b$bRazelikh plans to return to the Blasted Lands and overwhelm the lands with his demons. Even now, he is preparing to summon his legions to eliminate us.$b$b<The demon hunter quickly draws a rune in the air, then hands it to you.>$b$bDeliver this to Wazzik at the Dark Portal, to the southeast. He will guide you. Quickly! We haven't much time!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Discordant Rune to Watcher Wazzik at the Dark Portal in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: What? LORAMUS?!$b$bOh blast, keep it down, would ya? If my boss gets word that I worked for Loramus, do you know how quickly I'd be on my rear end?!$b$b<Wazzik takes the rune from you, presses it to his chest, closes his eyes, and nods.>$b$bWell, you weren't lying. Let's get to work.
